title: In the wake of Mendana
creator_credit: Norman K Wallis and Western Pacific High Commission
brief_description: An impression of life in the British Solomon Islands. Shows the natural vegetation of the islands; native villages; schools; hospitals; churches; industries; activities of the natives - singing, dancing, canoe racing. Mentions the history of the islands and the administration.
creator_credit_for_label: Norman K Wallis and Western Pacific High Commission
